---

# Automation Control Center - Configure tenant
---

## Create a team </br>
![ACC Create team](./img/create_team.png "ACC Create team")

## On the Catalog menu find the Automation Control Centre Dashboard service</br>
![Select ACC tool](./img/select_acc_catalog.png "Select ACC tool")

## Add the Automation Control Centre Dashboard to the new team</br>
![ACC tool on team](./img/add_team.png "ACC tool on team")

## Approve the Create Tool request</br>
1. Find the Create Tool request: </br>
![ACC tool request](./img/find_request.png "ACC tool request")

2. Approve and set all properties in order to config the application: </br>
![ACC tool property set](./img/approve_request.png "ACC tool property set") 

3. Set “Configure tenantName” property: </br>
The "Configure tenantName" property should be unique because with this value a new schema will be created in the database. </br>
![ACC tool configure tenantName](./img/configure_tenant_id.png "ACC tool configure tenantName")

4. Execute “ConfigureTenant” and "Insights jobs" http requests: </br>
The “ConfigureTenant” http request will configure the database for tenant.

5. “Complete” configuration:  </br>
![ACC Complete create team](./img/complete_request.png "ACC Complete create team")

## Approve the Join Service request</br>
1. Find the Join Service request: </br>
![ACC find tool request](./img/find_join_tool_request.png "ACC find tool request")
2. Approve request: </br>
![ACC Approve join tool](./img/approve_join_tool.png "ACC Approve join tool")

## ACC available on launchpad</br>
![ACC Launchpad](./img/launchpad.png "ACC Launchpad")
